mapper.insert: INSERT INTO solo (sid, spw, sname, sbirth, sage, sgender, sphone, semail, saddress, scompanyName, scompanyFile, stype, sbcnt) VALUES (#{sid}, #{spw}, #{sname}, #{sbirth}, #{sage}, #{sgender}, #{sphone}, #{semail}, #{saddress}, #{scompanyName}, #{scompanyFile}, #{stype}, 0)
mapper.select: select * from solo where sid = #{userid} and spw = #{userpw}
